short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultimate tab is a free and open source Chrome extension for managing and organizing tabs in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension was written to replace One Tab by adding features that I need, such as opening a group of tabs without deleting and sorting groups.
